intro: Schaueria, commonly known as the Schaueria plant, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. It is native to tropical and subtropical regions of Africa and Asia. The plant typically features palmate leaves and produces showy, clustered flowers in shades of pink or white. Schaueria species are often cultivated for their ornamental value due to their striking appearance. They prefer well-drained soil and full sun to partial shade for optimal growth.
